Changing androidx.activity:activity to 1.5.1 (previously 1.2.4) will also change:
    androidx.appcompat:appcompat (1.5.1)

Changing androidx.annotation:annotation-experimental to 1.3.0 (previously 1.1.0) will also change:
    androidx.appcompat:appcompat (1.5.1)
    com.google.android.material:material (1.6.1)

Changing androidx.appcompat:appcompat to 1.5.1 (previously 1.4.1) will also change:
    com.google.android.material:material (1.6.1)

Changing androidx.core:core to 1.9.0 (previously 1.7.0) will also change:
    androidx.appcompat:appcompat (1.5.1)
    com.google.android.material:material (1.6.1)

Changing androidx.core:core-ktx to 1.9.0 (previously 1.7.0) will also change:
    androidx.appcompat:appcompat (1.5.1)

Changing androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-common to 2.5.1 (previously 2.4.0) will also change:
    androidx.appcompat:appcompat (1.5.1)

Changing androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-livedata-core to 2.5.1 (previously 2.3.1) will also change:
    androidx.appcompat:appcompat (1.5.1)

Changing androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-runtime to 2.5.1 (previously 2.4.0) will also change:
    androidx.core:core-ktx (1.9.0)
    androidx.appcompat:appcompat (1.5.1)
    com.google.android.material:material (1.6.1)

Changing androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-viewmodel to 2.5.1 (previously 2.3.1) will also change:
    androidx.appcompat:appcompat (1.5.1)

Changing androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-viewmodel-savedstate to 2.5.1 (previously 2.3.1) will also change:
    androidx.appcompat:appcompat (1.5.1)

Changing androidx.savedstate:savedstate to 1.2.0 (previously 1.1.0) will also change:
    androidx.appcompat:appcompat (1.5.1)

Changing androidx.startup:startup-runtime to 1.1.1 (previously 1.0.0) will also change:
    androidx.appcompat:appcompat (1.5.1)

Changing com.squareup.okio:okio to 3.2.0 (previously 3.0.0) will also change:
    com.squareup.okhttp3:okhttp (4.10.0)

Changing org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-stdlib to 1.7.10 (previously 1.6.10) will also change:
    androidx.appcompat:appcompat (1.5.1)
    com.squareup.okhttp3:okhttp (4.10.0)
    com.jakewharton.timber:timber (5.0.1)

    org.jetbrains.kotlinx:kotlinx-coroutines-core (1.6.4)
    com.squareup.okio:okio (3.2.0)

    org.jetbrains.kotlinx:kotlinx-coroutines-core (1.6.4)

    com.squareup.okio:okio (3.2.0)
